it's not a continuous curve!

Because there is an abrupt change in what the derivative is, on both sides of the sharp point.  So kinks and cusps are not differentiable, because you get conflicting answers for what the derivative is, depending on which side you approach the sharp point.  The discontinuity in the derivative means it is not differentiable.
